thread.title: Theresa May's 'terrifying' laugh caught on camera during PMQs
thread.title_full: Theresa May's 'terrifying' laugh caught on camera during PMQs

author: Chloe Chaplain
title: Theresa May's 'terrifying' laugh caught on camera during PMQs
text:
Goodyear develops concept tyre with artificial intelligence 
A chuckle from the Prime Minister caused a sensation among viewers watching PMQs ahead of the Chancellor's spring Budget. 
Theresa May let out a chortle at a remark from Jeremy Corbyn, who was accusing her of being "unclear" over whether there had been a "sweetheart deal" with Surrey Council. 
Her "pantomime" laugh was immediately picked up on by viewers and led to ridicule on social media. 
Within seconds, the internet was filled with pictures and animations of the Prime Minister laughing. Theresa May's laugh during #PMQs today. Watch and enjoy. pic.twitter.com/zvHupcfOTI
